statements: UPDATE landmark_court_decisions SET plaintiffs = 'John Doe, Jane Smith' WHERE decision_id = 123;
UPDATE landmark_court_decisions SET defendants = 'Company XYZ' , judge_name = 'Judge Anderson' WHERE decision_id = 456;
UPDATE landmark_court_decisions SET plaintiffs = 'John Doe, Jane Smith' WHERE court_name = 'Supreme Court' AND decision_date = '2022-01-15';
UPDATE landmark_court_decisions SET judge_name = 'Judge Johnson', defendants = 'ABC Inc.' WHERE decision_id = 1001;
UPDATE landmarks SET jurisdiction='Supreme Court', importance_level='High' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE case_analysis SET analysis_details='New findings on the landmark case.', researcher_id=3 WHERE analysis_id=2;
UPDATE landmarks SET importance_level = 'High', jurisdiction = 'Supreme Court' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE case_analysis SET analysis_date = '2023-06-15', analysis_details = 'Detailed analysis report on the landmark case' WHERE analysis_id = 3;
UPDATE landmark_court_decisions SET court = 'Supreme Court', date_decided = '2022-03-15' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE legal_arguments SET argument_text = 'New argument text', argument_type = 'Legal precedents' WHERE argument_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE landmark_court_decisions SET summary = 'New summary for the landmark case' WHERE id = 'a0eebc99-9c0b-4ef8-bb6d-6bb9bd380a11';
UPDATE research_data SET findings = 'Updated research findings on the key case' WHERE research_id = 'fd98faf0-48d6-4670-8321-2780e7882272';
UPDATE landmark_court_decisions_womens_rights SET landmark_decision = TRUE WHERE decision_id = 1;
UPDATE judges SET years_on_bench = years_on_bench + 1 WHERE judge_id = 3;
UPDATE landmark_court_decisions_womens_rights SET case_name = 'Equal Pay Act Case' WHERE decision_id = 1;
UPDATE judges SET years_on_bench = 15, court_name = 'Supreme Court' WHERE judge_id = 3;
UPDATE landmark_court_decisions SET overview = 'Final judgment issued after a lengthy trial' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE judges SET court_name = 'Supreme Court' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE landmark_court_decisions SET court='Supreme Court', verdict='Guilty' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE judges SET years_on_bench=15, judge_name='John Doe' WHERE court_name='District Court';
